title: 194: Clare’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 (We Are HEATED!) + "Clare and Dale DIDN’T Talk Previously" Analysis
itunes:title: 194: Clare’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 2 (We Are HEATED!) + "Clare and Dale DIDN’T Talk Previously" Analysis
description:
(IMPORTANT: The Broads will be chatting about the tea and info that is currently being discussed by all major news sources) It is week 2 of "The Bachelorette" and honestly The Broads are truly confused at what they are watching. Before they dive into the recap they discuss all the reasons and evidence why they believe Dale and Clare truly had not been in contact before the show began filming. They then recap the episode discussing the overall uncomfy-ness of this season so far, they shout about the love languages date, they shout about the Jason date, they shout about the strip dodgeball date, they shout, and a whole lot more. Also (TW: sexual assault discussed) in the last few minutes of the episode Bekah speaks about Garret P’s recent Instagram comments. 


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS AND THEIR DEALS:
